DOC.brief_summary: This study will examine whether there is any difference in number of passes needed to diagnose pancreatic masses during endoscopic ultrasound-guided biopsies using 2 different types of needles.
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Methods to Biopsy Pancreas Mass
DOC.criteria: adult pancreas mass coagulopathy mass not approachable by endoscopic ultrasound biopsy
